discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Obi dze mbuae fofor to nkɔmbɔdzi yi mu a, {{GENDER:|i}}benya nkaabɔ. Ibotum so asesa wo nkaabɔ mu hyehyɛɛ mbrɛ epɛ no.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Nkitahodzi bea]] yɛ beebi a nkorɔfo dzi nkitaho fa kwan a wobotum ama ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ {{SITENAME}} no edzi mu.  {{GENDER:|I}}botum so edua dɛm kwan yi do na ahyɛ ase nye nkorɔfo atwetwe nkɔmbɔ wɔ mbrɛ a wobotu [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]] mpon ho.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ {{SITENAME}} botum edua dɛm [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|nkitahodzibea]] yi do dze amansuon nkrato ama {{GENDER:wo|}}, na wɔyɛ a, ibenya ho nkaabɔ.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ {{SITENAME}} yi do botum edua dɛm [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|nkitahodzibea]] yi do ama  amansuon nkrato a ɔkyerɛ nsesa a wofi IP adrɛɛse a {{GENDER:|e}}dze ridzi dwuma sesei yi hɔ.

IP adrɛɛse dodowara sesa aber biara, na mber pii nyimpa dodowara dze kyɛ nkorɔfo. Ibotum so [$1 ebue dwumadzidze fofor] anna [$2 akɔ mu] ama ɔmmfa daakye basabasayɛ mmba ɔwo nye nkorɔfo a woefi ha dada ntamu no. Ibue account a sie wo IP adrɛɛse no.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|nkitahodzibea]] yɛ beebi a nkorɔfo kyerɛ hɔn adwen wɔ kwan a wobotum ama {{SITENAME}} yi do ndzɛmba edzi mu. Hyɛ nkɔmbɔtwetwe fofor ase na e{{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|nye}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]] mbɔ mu ndzi bataboa. Dza {{GENDER:|e}}bɛka wɔ ha bɔtɔ gua afofor ehu.
discussiontools-emptystate-title: Hyɛ nkɔmbɔtwetwe a ɔfa {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} ho ase
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Yɛserɛ, {{GENDER:|san bue}} krataafa no dzi dwuma no bio hwɛ
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: Wɔdze wo tsirasɛm no aka ho
discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis: Fa krataafa yi ka  [[Special:Watchlist|dza w'enyi wɔ ho]] no ho.
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Dɛm nkasaho yi nnyi hɔ. Obotum aba dɛ wɔapepa anaa woeyi efi hɔ.
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Nkasaho fofor biara nnyi hɔ. Obotum aba dɛ wɔapepa anaa woeyi efi hɔ.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: {{GENDER:|Wo}} nsa bɛka nkrato wɔ asɛntsir yi mu adwenkyerɛ afofor ho.
{{GENDER:|Wo}} nsa nnkɛka nkrato wɔ asɛntsir yi mu adwenkyerɛ afofor ho bio.
